titleStmt.title: The Age of riddles, or, A true list of certain extraordinary positions formerly call'd contradictions, but now distinguished by no names at all / faithfully extracted from several modern doctrines and practises.
titleStmt.author: Trapp, Joseph, 1679-1747.
